name: JavaScript
description: The programming language of the web. Learn JavaScript to build interactive websites and web applications.

name: Python
description: A versatile, high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability. Perfect for beginners and used in data science, web development, and automation.

name: Java
description: A powerful, object-oriented programming language used for building enterprise applications, Android apps, and large-scale systems.

name: C++
description: A powerful, high-performance programming language used for system programming, game development, and performance-critical applications.
